dimension: 7 9/16 x 7 3/4 in. (19.21 x 19.69 cm) (laid down on sheet with architectural drawing)
title: Putto Lifting Drapery
marks:
Inscription

on back, in pencil: [101] and [60]
description: head, torso, PR thigh and knee and PL foot of seated figure with medium length dark wavy hair, leaning on PR arm, holding a white drape at right; portion of column visible behind figure; irregularly-shaped sheet laid down on two fragments of architectural drawings, with foliate swag in URQ and column fragment in ULC
